channel.title: Comments on: Buffalo-hunting Native Americans were Post-Collapse Pandemic Survivors

item.title: By: To Every PHP Employer: In a Covid-19 world, can we *please* work from home? – SurviveCorona.how
item.dc:creator: To Every PHP Employer: In a Covid-19 world, can we *please* work from home? – SurviveCorona.how
item.description: […] is it too much to ask if we can all start working from home before we are exposed and infected? Novel viruses usually infect 90% of the population, and even though “officially” this is only 5x times more deadly to people under 55 […]
item.content:encoded: […] is it too much to ask if we can all start working from home before we are exposed and infected? Novel viruses usually infect 90% of the population, and even though “officially” this is only 5x times more deadly to people under 55 […]
